body:
Comment 2 by **Ryan.FireBall**: 
Perhaps this would be better:


func main () {
 var a int
 var b type
 a = 9
 b = a.(type)
 c := make(map[*b]int)
 c[a] = 2
}

I'm not really trying to suggest new functionality, but rather, new syntax. That is, to
make reflect part of the language, not a package.
